snippet: The reauthorization of the Senate bill provides a refreshing demonstration of bipartisanship that the House would do well to emulate.
abstract: Editorial calls on House Speaker John Boehner to ensure that House follows Senate in reauthorizing Violence Against Women Act; notes 17 Republican members have written Boehner urging action on renewal, sign that GOP's rejection by female voters in November 2012 is causing some rethinking.
lead_paragraph: The reauthorization of the Senate bill provides a refreshing demonstration of bipartisanship that the House would do well to emulate.

headline.seo: Renew the Violence Against Women Act
headline.main: Renew the Violence Against Women Act
headline.print_headline: Renew the Violence Against Women Act
